game.name: Cotton Candy Shop
game.description:
Today you have got the invitation to visit and run a most popular store of the town: Cotton Candy Shop. Being blessed with some ultimate cooking skills, you have accepted this challenge and are now ready to show your matchless talent to the entire world. Start this brand new cooking game with helping the girl to decide a few common things like the colour of the stick of cotton candy with its shape along with the flavour of candy. We are sure that you will have a great fun while exploring this free online girlsâ€™ game till end. 

Make sure to decorate the candy as nicely as possible with the help of a few ingredients available on the screen. These decoration items include chocolate bits, fresh fruits, colourful candy, sprinkles as well as toys and bows. Feel to check out your creation by your own before getting it ready for others in this one of the best cooking games for girls! It will be amazing to grab a wonderful opportunity to wear the crown of an excellent food in this top candy game. 

The character of the game has a full faith on your food skills, so give your best and help her to surprise her customers with something refreshing and delicious desserts. Be careful while preparing the cotton candy since it is your own shop. Your single mistake can make your customer angry on you. We also maintain many other highly addictive and challenging best HTML5 games for free on our website. Check out more cooking games to get an immersive gaming experience!
